name: Renee
description: A place of rebirth and new beginnings, built upon the ashes of the old world.

Land Formations.name: River of Life
Land Formations.description: A river running through most of the continent, nourishing many diverse ecosystems along its path.

Settlements.name: Peakton
Settlements.description: A mountain town enduring the harsh conditions of piercing, frigid air.

Settlements.name: Delta
Settlements.description: A place of change along the River of Life's river delta.
